msg.msgText:
The IBM MessageSight objects and service files, such as log files, can be purged by using the "imaserver purge" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver purge help imaserver purge object_type help imaserver purge object_type "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver purge LogFile "Name=imaserver-security.log"
The following object types are supported: LogFile MessageSight log file

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
